property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Angel Command Shield Force (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields. While the chosen shield remains in the shield zone, this creature gains the following [Sheild Force] abilities): [Sheild Force] : Non-light creatures cost 4 more to summon. For each Fortress in your shield zone you may have your creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gets +12000 power. When the crossed creature attacks you may give it "Galaxy Breaker" until the end of that attack. (A creature with Galaxy Breaker breaks all of the opponent's shields. Then after that attack break all of your shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Giants must be blocked if possible. Whenever your Giants win a battle during your turn, break 1 of your opponent's shields. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Vortex Evolution: Put on 2 of any combination of Angel Command and/or Dragon. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks for the first time this turn, you may put up to 2 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you put a Dragon into your graveyard in this way, untap this card. If you put an Angel Command into your graveyard in this way, whenever this creature would be destroyed this turn, it stays in the battle zone instead. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Vortex Evolution: Put on 2 of any combination of Dragon and/or Knight. When this creature attacks, you may cast any number of fire or darkness spells from your graveyard with a total cost of 7 or less. Then, put those spells on the bottom of your deck in any order. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If there is a spell among the revealed cards you may return 1 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone to its owner's hand. Then, you may add 1 of the revealed spells to your hand. If there is a cross gear among the revealed cards you may return 1 card in your opponent's mana zone to its owner's hand. Then, you may add 1 of the revealed cross gears to your hand. Afterwards, put the rest of the revealed cards on the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose any number of your opponent's creatures with a total power of 9000 or less and destroy them. Then, for each creature destroyed in this way choose 1 of your opponent's shields and put it in its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Knightly Generation (When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may cast a spell in your hand with "Knight Magic" without cost.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gets +6000 power and breaks an additional shield. When the crossed creature would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand. Samurai Magic (When you generate this card and you have a Samurai creature in your battle zone, search your deck. You may put a [Flowing Gear - Dancing Twin Lion Fangs] from it into the battle zone without cost. Then, shuffle your deck.)

card.name: Master of Destiny, the Spirit Wolf Phoenix

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Vortex Evolution: Put on 1 of your Samurai creatures and 1 of your Knight creatures. When this creature attacks, you may cast 1 spell with "Shield Trigger" from your mana zone without cost. Then, you may put 1 cross gear into your battle zone from your mana zone. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cross 1 cross gear in your battle zone to this creature without cost. When this creature is added to your hand from the shield zone, if you have a cross gear in your battle zone this creature gains "Shield Trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, this creature can't be chosen. (However, this creature may be attacked or blocked.) Your opponent can't return spells from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gains "Blocker". The crossed creature untaps at the end of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Knight creatures When this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more spells in your graveyard, draw 1 card. Double Breaker

card.name: Amaterasu, Founder of the Blue Wolves

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may either cast a spell with a cost of 4 or less from your deck without cost OR you may generate a cross gear with a cost of 4 or less from your deck without cost. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress: Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When the fortified shield leaves the shield zone, put this card into the graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into the graveyard.) All cards returned from the fortified shield gain "Shield Trigger"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Dark Lord When this creature attacks, you may put 1 non-evolution Dark Lord into the battle zone from your graveyard. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures. If that creature is a God, destroy 1 more of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress: Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When the fortified shield leaves the shield zone, put this card into the graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into the graveyard.) Whenever your opponent's creatures attack and are not blocked, after the attack destroy that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Knight creatures Double Breaker Whenever you cast a spell, until the end of that turn this creature gets +6000 power and "Triple Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 3000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 4 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, all of your other creatures in the battle zone get +3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature battles, your opponent chooses 1 card in your hand at random. If that card is a creature, that creature's power is added to this creature's power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Cross Gear The crossed creature gets +4000 power and "Blocker". When the crossed creature attacks, discard 1 card in your opponent's hand at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. [Knight Magic] : Until the end of this turn, all of your creatures get "Power Attacker +3000" and break an additional shield. Knight Magic (If there is a Knight in your battle zone, you may use this spell's [Knight Magic] ability once more.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your have at least 1 other Angel Command in your battle zone you may choose 1 of your opponent's non-evolution creatures and put it in your opponent's shield zone face down. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 4 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, untap 1 of your creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gets +1500 power. Cross gears may be crossed with the crossed creature without cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you fortify 1 of your shields with a Fortress, you may either draw a card OR choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy 1 of your creatures. Then, put that creature into the battle zone from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gets +2000 power. When the crossed creature attacks, draw 3 cards. Then, put 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Samurai Generation (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may generate a cross gear from your hand without paying its cost.) All of your crossed creatures gain "Slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and discard 1 non-creature card from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear When the crossed creature attacks, until the end of this turn all of your creatures in the battle zone get +2000 power and all of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone get -1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Samurai Generation (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may generate a cross gear from your hand without paying its cost.) Double Breaker Whenever you put a cross gear into your battle zone, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 4000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker". That creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Knight Magic] : Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker". Knight Magic (If there is a Knight in your battle zone, you may use this spell's [Knight Magic] ability once more.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may reduce the summoning cost of this creature by 1 for each spell in your mana zone. It can't cost less than 1. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have your Giant cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. Saver: Giant (Whenever one of your Giant would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress: Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When the fortified shield leaves the shield zone, put this card into the graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into the graveyard.) All of your creatures in the battle zone gain "Power Attacker +3000".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Samurai creatures When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each Fortress in your shield zone you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face-down and tap 1 of your opponent's creatures. When this creature is added to your hand from your shields and there is a Fortress in your shield zone, this creature gains "Shield Trigger". Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players unless crossed with at least 1 cross gear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal 1 Samurai or Cross Gear in your hand. If you don't, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gets +1000 power for each cross gear crossed with the crossed creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 card in your opponent's graveyard and put it on the bottom of their deck. When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker When this creature blocks, you may draw a card. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. From the revealed cards you may add 1 creature, 1 spell, 1 cross gear, and 1 Fortress to your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your Samurai creatures are destroyed, your opponent chooses 1 card in your shield zone and turns it face-up. If the revealed card is a non-evolution Samurai card you may put it into the battle zone. If it isn't you may put it into your graveyard. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your shields face-down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 cross gear into your graveyard from your battle zone. If you do, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy the creature in your opponent's battle zone with the lowest power. If there are 2 or more creatures that share the lowest power, choose 1 of them and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gets +1000 power. When the crossed creature attacks, if your opponent has 3 or more cards in their hand they choose a card in their hand and discard it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All of your other Knights in the battle zone get "Speed Attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 1 spell in your graveyard, this creature gains "Speed Attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, this creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Knight Magic] : Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 3000 power or less OR put 1 cross gear in your opponent's battle zone into its owner's graveyard. Knight Magic (If there is a Knight in your battle zone, you may use this spell's [Knight Magic] ability once more.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 2 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 2 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, 1 of your creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Knight Magic] : Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Knight Magic (If there is a Knight in your battle zone, you may use this spell's [Knight Magic] ability once more.)
